bibl.title: Telegram from Robert H. Kean to Philip Showalter Hench, April 7, 1954

div1.p: Kean informs Hench that Cornelia Kean has died.

div1.head: Telegram from Robert H. Kean to Philip Showalter Hench, April 7, 1954
div1.opener:
WESTERN
UNION
W.P. MARSHALL, PRESIDENT
(48).
_________________________________________________
The filing time shown in the date line on telegrams and day letters in STANDARD TIME at point of origin. Time of receipt is STANDARD TIME at point of destination
1954 APR 7 AM 12 O4
MA333 RA381
R.LLE231 NL PD=RICHMOND VIR APR 6=
DR PHILIP S HENCH=
102 SECOND AVE SOUTHWEST ROCHESTER MINN=
div1.p:
MRS J R KEAN DIED THIS MORNING IN WASHINGTON OF CORONARY
ATTACK FUNERAL THURSDAY AFTERNOON AT FORT MYERS CHAPEL
BURIAL ARLINGTON CEMETERY=
div1.closer: ROBERT H KEAN= THE COMPANY WILL APPRECIATE SUGGESTIONS FROM ITS PATRONS CONCERNING ITS SERVICE
